overview: Chinga, Gordo and Pipe, a group of young people who live in an area of armed conflict, set out to fish for the corpse of an NN (unidentified body), because according to belief, when they are rescued from the river they become amulets that bring luck. . When they finally grab one, they recognize that it is the corpse of a young man from their village. While Gordo and Chinga mourn, Pipe insists on keeping the dead man at all costs and thus gain the recognition of his friends.
title: The saints
